BSI Full-Frame Sensor: At the heart of the D850 is a back-side illuminated (BSI) FX-format full-frame CMOS image sensor with 45.7 megapixels and no optical low-pass filter. It achieves extraordinary image quality, enhanced light gathering efficiency, faster data readout and truer color

Recording: Multimedia content creators rejoice. You are now free to record 16:9 4K Ultra HD (3840x2160) in full frame glory using the total width and resolution of the D850's back-side illuminated (BSI) CMOS sensor

details.product_descriptions: The Nikon D850 is an amazing DSLR camera that is capable of shooting up to 45.7 megapixels at a high rate of speed, making it an ideal solution for high-end enthusiasts and professionals in every category. One of its best features is the Back-Side Illuminated (BSI) Full-Frame Image Sensor. Why is that so important? Well the technology of this sensor means that the light-collecting parts of the sensor are much closer to the surface of the chip that most other sensors. This equates to dramatically improved low-light performance and improved quality on the edges of your photos. BSI Full-Frame Image Sensor At the heart of the D850 is a back-side illuminated (BSI) FX-format full-frame CMOS image sensor with 45.7 megapixels and no optical low-pass filter. It achieves extraordinary image quality, enhanced light gathering efficiency, faster data readout and truer color. And with such a dense array of pixels, there's virtually no risk of moire. Detail and Sharpness Faster than EXPEED 4, EXPEED 5 quickly processes all 45.7 megapixels of data for lower noise, wider dynamic range, subtle tonal and textural details, high-speed continuous shooting at approx. 9 fps and full-frame 4K UHD movie recording. Autofocus That Keeps Up The D850 uses the same field-proven ultra-accurate AF system as the flagship D5. With 153 focus points, 99 cross-type sensors and a dedicated AF processor, the D850 delivers all of its 45.7 MP performance with NIKKOR lenses. Autofocus down to -4 EV lets you capture in low-light situations. Bundle Includes:

datas.product: Projector with 5G WiFi and Bluetooth JIFAR 560 ANSI 16000L Native 1080P Outdoor Movie Projector 4k Support,Auto 6D Keystone&50% Zoom,Portable Smart Home LED Video Projector for Phone/PC

about_this_item: ➤【Native 1080P+480ANSI+12000:1 Contrast Ratio】Features a powerful 1080P FHD resolution with 480 ANSI LM, C56 4k projector delivers incredible details on your massive 450-inch screen without compromise. German-based RGB+PB high power lamp offers 80% higher brightness than other 1080P outdoor projector.The superior 12,000:1 contrast ratio and 8-bit color depth maximize color details for enhanced fidelity and premium color accuracy. Inbuilt 12 wallpapers for your choice per preference.

➤【5G/2.4G WiFi+Bi-directional Bluetooth 5.1】E30 bluetooth projector with 2.4+5G WiFi, has strong anti-interference capability to ensure fast& stable transmission while reduces 60% delay than other mini projector. The latest bi-directional Bluetooth 5.1 tech allows the phone projector to be used as a stand-alone Bluetooth audio, yet connect to external audio to create the perfect sound. The built-in 12W stereo speaker offers crisp highs and lows output to truly gives you a theatre experience.

➤【4P+Auto 6D Keystone&100%-50% Zoom】C56 proyector offers ±50 6D auto correction, helps to set right pictures without effort and get rid of complicated manual keystone! Plus comprehensive 4-Point Correction, overcomes angles from room limitations in a few ways and bring flexibility to Front/Side/Ceiling Projection. Distortion-free 100-50% Zoom allows adjustment of the picture to the right size without moving it.Excel/Word/PPT can play via USB, makes it ideal for small meetings or presentations

➤【Wider Compatibility】 This 1080P HD projector is featured with multiple ports for ease of use, including a HDMI, USB, SD and AV interface. It's the perfect solution for a wide variety of inputs including but not limited to TV Stick/Box, Chrome-cast, Roku-Stick, Game Console, PCs, Smartphone & Laptops, DVD player, SD card and USB Sticks, External Speaker etc.

➤【Sealed Engine& Wide Connectivity】C56 Projectors with full-sealed optical system avoids dust pollution on optical components and helps prolong the lifespan of the projectors. Equipped with AV/USB/2*HDMI/Audio ports, allow you to hook up PC/TV Stick//Switch easily. Operation videos are prepared on YouTube to help you get started! Feel free to contact us by Product Support or after-sale email for any issues, Higfra promises 24/7 service, 1 Year Replacement, 3 Year repair & lifelong

about_this_item: High-resolution thermal monocular for hunting with a 384x288 detector and 12μm high-sensitivity focal plane array.
1280x960 resolution LCOS display for crystal-clear thermal vision in any conditions.
Detection Range 710m/yd, making it an ideal thermal monocular for hunting and outdoor activities.
Wi-Fi hotspot and AGM Connect App compatibility for easy image and video sharing and remote parameter adjustment.
Digital zoom capabilities up to 12x for up-close thermal imaging and infrared monocular vision.
Cutting-edge adaptive AGC, DDE, and 3D DNR technology for superior thermal imaging and heat vision.
Long-lasting rechargeable Lithium battery with more than 7.5 hours of continuous running time (with Wi-Fi hotspot function off).

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #55,615 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)#16 in Night Vision Monoculars

details.product_descriptions: Introducing the Taipan 15-384 Thermal Imaging Monocular - your ultimate tool for night hunting and wildlife observation. With its advanced technology, you can easily detect heat signatures from objects, animals, and people in complete darkness or low-light conditions. Equipped with a powerful IR sensor, this monocular allows you to see clearly and navigate your surroundings with ease. Its thermal imaging technology provides a reliable and accurate picture of the heat signatures around you, making it an excellent tool for hunting and outdoor activities. With a detection range of up to 710 meters or yards for a 6-foot object, the Taipan 15-384 is perfect for long-range surveillance and target acquisition. It can quickly detect potential prey or intruders, giving you an advantage in any situation. Thanks to its compact and lightweight design, this infrared monocular is easy to carry and handle. Whether you're out hunting, camping, or exploring the great outdoors, the Taipan 15-384 Thermal Imaging Monocular is an essential tool that you won't want to be without. Key Features: High-performance thermal imaging technology Detection range of up to 710 meters or yards for a 6-foot object Lightweight and compact design for easy handling Ideal for night hunting, wildlife observation, and outdoor activities Provides heat vision, thermal vision, and infrared monocular capabilities Excellent tool for target acquisition and surveillance in low-light conditions Durable and reliable construction for long-lasting use Perfect for anyone who wants to enhance their hunting experience or outdoor adventures. Get ready to take your hunting experience to the next level with the Taipan 15-384 Thermal Imaging Monocular!

datas.product: Sony Alpha a6600 APS-C Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Bundle with DJI RS 3 Mini Gimbal Touchscreen Stabilizer, Photo Editing Software, 128 SD Card, and Storage Bag with Accessories (6 Items)

about_this_item: Bundle Includes: Sony Alpha a6600 APS-C Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera, DJI RS 3 Mini Gimbal Touchscreen Stabilizer, Camera Bag, 128GB Memory Card, Memory Case with Card Reader, and Photo Editing Software
High-Performance Features: The Alpha a6600 is equipped with fast autofocus (AF), steady image stabilization, and impressive 4K HDR (HLG) movie shooting capabilities.

Advanced Autofocus System: The camera boasts reliable and persistent autofocus with densely distributed focus points covering around 84% of the image area. The Fast Hybrid AF system achieves a world-leading 0.02-s acquisition speed.
Fast Continuous Shooting: The a6600 allows fast continuous shooting at up to 11 frames per second (fps) with minimal display lag, providing up to 1164 shots in JPEG (Standard) at one time.
Image Quality and Stabilization: The 24.2-megapixel APS-C image sensor, combined with a 5-axis optical image stabilization mechanism, delivers high-quality images with low-noise performance.

details.product_descriptions: The a6600 packs in the features, to deliver what you need for just about any situation you encounter  fast AF, steady image stabilization and stunning image quality, a high-capacity battery and serious 4K HDR (HLG) movie shooting. The Alpha a6600 includes a 24.2MP2 Exmor CMOS image sensor, the latest BIONZ X image processor and a front-end LSI as implemented in Sony's full-frame cameras, which combine to deliver all-round enhancements in image quality and performance across all areas of photo and video capture. This camera packs great performance and features in its compact body, with the world's fastest AF speed, broad AF coverage and subject tracking. Five-axis optical image stabilization ensures stunning image quality for high-resolution 4K HDR (HLG) movie recording and stills, while the high-capacity battery and mic and headphone jacks support your film-making. Reliable and persistent AF Densely distributed focus points cover around 84% of the image area, and the Fast Hybrid AF system combines the best of phase-detection AF and contrast-detection AF to achieve a world-leading 0.02-s acquisition speed. When subjects are in motion, AF points densely positioned around the subject are activated for accurate tracking. Fast continuous shooting with AF/AE at up to 11fps Shoot at up to 11 fps with minimal display lag, and 8 fps with live view, in bursts of up to 1164 shots in JPEG (Standard) at one time. Nikon's Stepping Motor (STM) provides smooth, fast and quiet autofocusing, whether shooting stills or video
Extensively sealed to keep dust and moisture out, especially around all moving parts of the lens barrel, for worry-free durability
details.product_descriptions: Meet the most versatile lens in the Z series stable. A powerful mid-range zoom that's indispensable for a wide range of photo and video applications, from landscapes and street photography to full-length and environmental portraits, all with stunning clarity, high resolution and natural bokeh. Elevated by a new Multi-Focus System, next generation lens flare correction and advanced S-Line features and functionality, the NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S is a must-have lens that marks the sweet spot of performance, precision and optical superiority.

details.product_descriptions: The EOS R6 features the same base image sensor and image processor as the EOS-1D X Mark III, enabling a native ISO range of 100-102, 400. With high-speed continuous shooting of upto 12 fps with the Mechanical shutter and upto 20 fps with Electronic silent shutter, the EOS R6 can keep up with just about any fast moving subject. Combined with the new Dual Pixel CMOS AF II system with approx. 100% coverage of the frame, and 1,053 Automatic AF Zones, the EOS R6 will confidently follow elusive subjects at 20fps for sharp images. Tracking subjects is easy and intuitive with the ability to track people using Eye, Face and Head Detection AF, or when tracking the whole body, face or eye of cats, dogs, or birds with Animal Detection AF. With the new 5-axis In-Body Image Stabilizer, up to 8-stops of shake correction is possible with both non-stabilized and optically image-stabilized lenses, opening up many more creative opportunities for incredibly stable lower light photo or video content creation. Those looking for creative cinematic video options will appreciate frame rates including 4K 60P and Full HD 120P with the option of internally recorded 4:2:2 10-bit Canon Log or HDR-PQ recording. And the inclusion of Dual SDXC UHS-II card slots combined with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth allows for multiple transfer and automatic backup options, making the EOS R6 ready when you are.

details.product_descriptions: Extreme resolution meets extreme speed. When Nikon introduced the D800 and D800E, it set a new benchmark for DSLR image quality and super high resolution photography that approached medium format. Now, five years later, Nikon proudly introduces the next evolution in high resolution DSLRs, a camera that allows photographers to capture fast action in 45.7 megapixels of brilliant resolution. With remarkable advancements across the board - sensor design, auto focus, dynamic range, sensitivity, Speed light control, battery life, shutter and mirror drive mechanisms, Silent Photography in Live-View mode, focus shift capability and more. This is quite possibly the most impressive, well-rounded DSLR yet. GPS: GP-1 GPS Unit, GP-1A GPS unit. Operating Environment Temperature- 32 to 104 degree Fahrenheit (0 to 40 degree Celsius Humidity- Less than 85% (no condensation).

datas.product: WideMeet Automatic 360 Degree Camera Video Photobooth LED Tempered Glass Infinite 360 Photo Booth Machine with Flight Case Packing for Wedding Parties (31.5'' Glass + Flight Case)

about_this_item: 【360 Spin Photo Booth】Turn on the 360 camera machine, you can wirelessly control the speed and direction of rotation to make a 360 degree panorama rotating video. Suitable for large-scale events, weddings, shows, exhibitions, bar and celebration, film, advertising, live broadcast field, personal DIY videos/Vlogs, TikTok, Instagram & other Social Media etc.

【Dual APP/Remote Control】The 360 Selfie Platform Machine can be controlled through the Remote or APP (Ytok), which can achieve Automatic spin, Spin reverse, LED brightness adjustment, RGB color changeable, Rotation time choice and speed control.

【Support Multiple Devices】The 360 photo booth machine contains holders to support Cell Phones, iPads, GoPro, DSLR cameras. The height of the selfie holder can be adjusted to 6.23ft max and the angle from 90 degree to 135 degree.One photo booth meet suitable for different peopel from child to adult to enjoy it. One machine can meet the different needs of different groups of people.
【Tempered Glass + RGB Lights】Tempered glass 360 video booth made by high quality tempered glass, and the led lights could control by remote control and app also, bring people visual enjoyment.

【Highlight Your Recorded Video】Multi-colored ring light and RGB led strip lights(stick around the platform) was installed on 360 camera to increase the shooting atmosphere. You can adjust the lighting color you want according to different occasions to meet your various needs. The ring light was powered by any branded power bank(not included).

datas.product: Nikon Z6II Mirrorless Camera Body FX-Format Full-Frame 4K UHD Video 1659 Bundle with Deco Gear Travel Bag Case + Extra Battery + Photography LED + Photo Video Editing Software Kit & Accessories

about_this_item: Nikon AUTHORIZED Model- Includes Full Nikon USA WARRANTY. Nikon Z 6II. True Multimedia Powerhouse. The most versatile Z series camera yet, balancing speed, power, low-light ability, and advanced video features. Features a 24.5-megapixel BSI CMOS sensor and dual EXPEED 6 Processors. Impressive ISO range from ISO 100-51,200, expandable up to ISO 204,800 equivalent. The Z 6II boasts a fast 14 fps continuous shooting speed, providing quick performance for capturing action.

Full frame. Full pixel readout. Full featured 4K UHD Video. Built with videographers in mind, the Z6 II is capable of a variety of frame rates, including 4K UHD 60p with full pixel readout, 4K 30p, as well as Full HD 120p for slow motion. The Z 6II's AF speed and tracking sensitivity is adjustable to meet creative needs, while the focus ring is also reversible. | Dual card slots (CFexpress/XQD + UHS-II SD) provide flexibility when shooting important moments such as weddings and events.

The Z 6II's enhanced AF system features 273 on-sensor phase-detect autofocus points for easy subject acquisition and tracking throughout the frame, including at the edges. The Z 6II easily acquires focus in extreme low light scenarios (down to -4.5 EV5) , making it an ideal option for capturing nightscapes and events. The Z 6II also supports Eye-Detection AF and Animal-Detection AF with video recording, enabling continuous focus on the eyes of humans, dogs, and cats.

CAMERA INCLUDES: Nikon Z6II Mirrorless Camera Full Frame FX-format Body Only 1659 | EN-EL15c Rechargeable Li-ion Battery | MH-25a Battery Charger | EH-7p Charging AC Adapter | UC-E24 USB Cable | HDMI/USB Cable Clip | BS-1 Accessory Shoe Cover | AN-DC19 Strap | BF-N1 Body Cap | DK-29 Rubber Eyecup | Nikon USA Authorized Warranty
